cisc275.group3.controller

Class ControllerTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc275.group3.controller.ControllerScene
      • cisc275.group3.controller.ControllerTools
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ControllerTools
extends ControllerScene
    The Tools controller is responsible for both the "model" and control of the toolbox.

    The toolbox augments the mouse and sets a "click type" that can be checked against the object type to determine compatibility. Because there is no underlying model, the controller implements the corresponding logic.

    ControllerTool.java

    Author:
    Scott, Jolyne
